pageTitle: Trade Smarter, Not Harder – Experience Automated Trading
pageSubtitle: Hey there, I’m Auri—your intelligent trading companion, here to make trading seamless, powerful, and worry-free. I combine advanced automation, rock-solid risk management, and 24/7 reliability to help you dominate the markets. Let’s trade smarter, not harder, together!
behindTheScenesTitle: Behind the Scenes: How I Work
behindTheScenesDescription: Let me take you behind the curtain! I’m built to handle the complexities of trading with ease, delivering consistent results while you focus on the things that matter most. Every part of me is designed to create a fully automated trading experience that’s as effortless as it is effective.

orchestrator.title: The Orchestrator
orchestrator.whatItDoesDescription: I’m the mastermind behind your trading system! From the moment we get started to real-time monitoring and secure shutdowns, I ensure everything operates flawlessly around the clock.
orchestrator.benefit1: Effortless Integration: I set everything up seamlessly and make sure it runs smoothly from start to finish.
orchestrator.benefit2: Real-Time Monitoring: My built-in 'heartbeat' keeps track of market conditions, ensuring everything stays efficient and responsive.

signalGuru.title: SignalGuru
signalGuru.whatItDoesDescription: I’m your go-to signal processor, capturing trading signals, validating them, and turning them into actionable trades—all automatically. It’s like having a signal whisperer in your corner!
signalGuru.benefit1: Smart Signal Processing: I ensure every signal is optimized for the best possible outcome.
signalGuru.benefit2: Built-In Verification: Only high-quality signals that meet my strict criteria make the cut, so you can trade confidently.

tradeNavigator.title: TradeNavigator
tradeNavigator.whatItDoesDescription: This is where the magic happens. I handle your trade executions, adjustments, and closures with precision, automating every step so you can focus on strategy.
tradeNavigator.benefit1: Automated Execution: I open and close trades for you based on pre-defined strategies—no guesswork involved.
tradeNavigator.benefit2: Enhanced Risk Control: With built-in safeguards like trailing stops and emergency stops, I make sure your investments are always protected.

marketVision.title: MarketVision
marketVision.whatItDoesDescription: I’m always watching the market. With real-time analysis of trading symbols, bid/ask prices, spreads, and more, I deliver the data you need to make informed decisions.
marketVision.benefit1: Accurate Market Insights: I calculate pip values, tick sizes, and stop levels with precision, so you’re always one step ahead.
marketVision.benefit2: Real-Time Data Access: You’ll have up-to-the-minute market snapshots to guide your strategies.

riskGuard.title: RiskGuard
riskGuard.whatItDoesDescription: Risk is part of trading, but I make sure it’s always under control. By calculating and enforcing optimal position sizes, I ensure your trades stay safe and within your comfort zone.
riskGuard.benefit1: Dynamic Adjustments: I automatically tailor position sizes to match your unique risk preferences.
riskGuard.benefit2: Protection You Can Count On: Over-leveraging? Not on my watch. My real-time margin checks keep you protected at all times.

sessionGuardian.title: SessionGuardian
sessionGuardian.whatItDoesDescription: I know when the markets are most active and profitable, and I make sure we focus our efforts during those prime windows.
sessionGuardian.benefit1: Optimized Trading Windows: I execute trades during the busiest and most liquid sessions for maximum impact.
sessionGuardian.benefit2: Global Flexibility: Want to trade the Asian, London, or New York sessions—or all three? No problem! I’m ready to take on the world.

questions.question: How does Auri provide trading insights?
questions.answer: I analyze massive amounts of data in real-time, including price movements, market sentiment, whale activity, and on-chain metrics. Using advanced AI models, I generate actionable insights tailored to your trading style, helping you stay ahead of the market.

questions.question: What markets can I trade with Auri?
questions.answer: I support crypto, forex, and stock markets, giving you the flexibility to explore multiple asset classes. Whether you’re into Bitcoin, EUR/USD, or Tesla, I’ve got you covered with precise, data-driven insights.

questions.question: Can beginners use Auri?
questions.answer: Absolutely! I’m here to support traders of all levels. With my educational tutorials, trade feedback, and easy-to-understand signals, I’ll help you build confidence and improve your trading skills step by step.

questions.question: How accurate are Auri’s trading signals?
questions.answer: I use fine-tuned AI models to provide high-conviction signals based on real-time data analysis. While no trading system is infallible, my goal is to maximize your edge with precise entry, exit, and risk parameters.

questions.question: Does Auri follow crypto and forex?
questions.answer: Yes, Auri monitors crypto price action for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, XRP, and more to come. It also tracks forex price action for major pairs like EUR/USD, GBP/USD, AUD/USD, USD/JPY, and others, with more being added regularly.

AuriDisclaimer.title: Auri Disclaimer
AuriDisclaimer.subtitle: We are not liable for any losses incurred by our customers or clients as a result of the use of our services.
AuriDisclaimer.paragraph1: Trading is risky and many will lose money in connection with trading activities. All content on this site is not intended to, and should not be, construed as financial advice. Decisions to buy, sell, hold or trade in securities, commodities and other markets involve risk and are best made based on the advice of qualified financial professionals. Past performance does not guarantee future results.
AuriDisclaimer.paragraph2: Hypothetical or Simulated performance results have certain limitations. Unlike an actual performance record, simulated results do not represent actual trading. Also, since the trades have not been executed, the results may have under-or-over compensated for the impact, if any, of certain market factors, including, but not limited to, lack of liquidity. Simulated trading programs in general are designed with the benefit of hindsight, and are based on historical information. No representation is being made that any account will or is likely to achieve profit or losses similar to those shown.
AuriDisclaimer.paragraph3: Testimonials appearing on this website may not be representative of other clients or customers and is not a guarantee of future performance or success.
AuriDisclaimer.paragraph4: As a provider of technical analysis tools for charting platforms, we do not have access to the personal trading accounts or brokerage statements of our customers. As a result, we have no reason to believe our customers perform better or worse than traders as a whole based on any content or tool we provide.
AuriDisclaimer.paragraph5: Charts used on this site are by TradingView in which the majority of our tools are built on. TradingView® is a registered trademark of TradingView, Inc. www.TradingView.com.
AuriDisclaimer.paragraph6: TradingView® has no affiliation with the owner, developer, or provider of the Services described herein.
AuriDisclaimer.paragraph7: This does not represent our full Disclaimer. Please read our full disclaimer.

ReadyToGetStarted.Title: Ready to Elevate Your Trading Journey?
ReadyToGetStarted.Description: Join AlgoMaticTrader.com today and unlock the tools, insights, and community you need to succeed. Start your path to smarter trading now!

section1.title: Maximize Your Trading Potential with AI
section1.description: Get the latest insights and trading signals to help you make informed decisions in the crypto and forex markets.

section2.title: Make Smarter Trading Decisions with AI Insights
section2.description: Auri provides a comprehensive suite of tools to assist traders in making informed decisions. Get real-time, accurate market data and insights with our powerful technical analysis tools and discover new opportunities in the cryptocurrency or forex market.

section3.title: Unlock the Power of AI for Trading
section3.description: Ready to maximize your trading opportunities? With Auri's advanced technical analysis and AI-generated signals, you can take your crypto and Forex trading to the next level with confidence. Get reliable insight today and start seeing the results you want.

section4.title: Stay Informed with Market Alerts
section4.description: Keep an eye on the market and never miss an opportunity. Get alerted of large buys/sells and track history of whale activities for 1000+ Future & Spot markets with Auri. Stay informed, stay ahead.

section5.title: Be the First to Know When the Market Moves
section5.description: Stay one step ahead with real-time alerts on market pumps & dumps and unusual volume activities. Take advantage of every opportunity with Auri on iOS and Android.

section6.title: Unlock Your Full Crypto Trading Potential
section6.description: Enhance your trading experience and maximize returns with Auri's comprehensive suite of AI-powered tools and insights.

CoreFeatures.Title: Core Features
CoreFeatures.Subtitle: Explore the powerful tools and insights Auri offers to elevate your trading experience.

Features.Title: AI-Powered Trading Signals
Features.Description: Leverage advanced AI algorithms to receive accurate buy and sell signals for crypto and forex markets.

Features.Title: Comprehensive Market Analysis
Features.Description: Access real-time data and in-depth analysis with advanced charting tools to make informed trading decisions.

Features.Title: Personalized Risk Management
Features.Description: Set custom risk parameters and stop-loss levels to safeguard your investments and optimize returns.

Features.Title: Educational Resources
Features.Description: Enhance your trading knowledge with a wealth of resources, including articles, videos, and webinars.

Features.Title: Real-Time Alerts
Features.Description: Stay ahead of market movements with instant notifications for significant events, price changes, and volume spikes.

Features.Title: Seamless Exchange Integration
Features.Description: Connect your favorite exchanges to execute trades directly from the platform, ensuring a smooth trading experience.

Disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
Disclaimer.content: Our site is for educational use only and should not be considered financial advice. Trading and Investing Activities are Inherently Risky, and Users of Our Material Should Be Prepared to Incur Losses in Connection with such Activities.

RiskDisclaimer.title: Risk Disclaimer
RiskDisclaimer.content1: Trading and investing are risky. Many will lose money in connection with trading and investing activities.All content on this site is not intended to, and should not be, construed as financial advice. Decisions to buy, sell, hold or trade in securities, commodities and other investments involve risk and are best made based on the advice of qualified financial professionals. Past performance does not guarantee future results.The risk of loss in trading and investing can be substantial. You should therefore carefully consider whether such trading and investing activities are suitable for you in light of your financial condition.

HypotheticalDisclaimer.title: Hypothetical and Simulated Performance Disclaimer
HypotheticalDisclaimer.content: Hypothetical or Simulated performance results have certain limitations. Unlike an actual performance record, simulated results do not represent actual trading. Also, since the trades have not been executed, the results may have under-or-over compensated for the impact, if any, of certain market factors, including, but not limited to, lack of liquidity. Simulated trading programs in general are designed with the benefit of hindsight, and are based on historical information. No representation is being made that any account will or is likely to achieve profit or losses similar to those shown.

TestimonialsDisclaimer.title: Testimonials Disclaimer
TestimonialsDisclaimer.content: Testimonials appearing on this website may not be representative of other clients or customers and are not a guarantee of future performance or success. Any trading results depicted in testimonials are not verified and we have no basis for believing that individual experiences depicted are typical considering that results will vary given many factors such as skill, risk management, experience, and the fact that trading and investing are very high-risk activities where it is likely you will lose money. As a provider of technical analysis tools for charting platforms, we do not have access to the personal trading accounts or brokerage statements of our customers. As a result, we have no reason to believe our customers perform better or worse than traders as a whole based on any content or tool we provide.

InvestmentDisclaimer.title: Auri Is Not An Investment Adviser
InvestmentDisclaimer.content: Auri is not registered as an investment adviser with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission. Rather, Auri relies upon the “publisher’s exclusion” from the definition of “investment adviser” as provided under Section 202(a)(11)(D) of the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 (the “Advisers Act”) and corresponding state laws. As such, Auri does not offer or provide personalized investment advice and nothing in these materials should be construed as investment advice within the meaning of the Advisers Act.

EducationalDisclaimer.title: Informational and Educational Purposes Only
EducationalDisclaimer.content1: To the extent any of the content, material, information and/or any other kind of informational offering published, broadcast, or otherwise stated on this, and/or associated websites, may be deemed to be “investment advice”, such information is impersonal and not tailored to the investment needs of any specific person. The information contained within this, and/or, associated websites, is provided for informational and educational purposes only. The information should not be construed as investment or trading advice and is not meant to be a solicitation or recommendation to buy, sell, or hold any positions in any indices or financial markets mentioned. The content and information provided by Auri, the website and the products and services of Auri, is solely incidental to the business and activities of Auri in providing educational tools for technical analysis. Auri does not, and will not, provide you with any legal, tax, estate planning or accounting advice, or any advice regarding the suitability, profitability or appropriateness for you of any security, investment, financial product, investment strategy or other matter. The data, content and information within the tools & scanners should not be construed as investment or trading advice and is not meant to be a solicitation or recommendation to buy, sell, or hold any positions in any securities or to engage in any other transaction.

TradingViewDisclosure.title: TradingView Disclosure
TradingViewDisclosure.content: Charts used on this site are by TradingView in which our tools are built on. TradingView® is a registered trademark of TradingView, Inc. www.TradingView.com. TradingView has no affiliation with the owner, developer, or provider of the Services described herein.

PrivacyNotice.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyNotice.content: Auri respects the privacy of information that identifies you or is identifiable to you (Personal Information). We want you to understand how Auri processes Personal Information, and how you can submit privacy rights requests to us concerning your Personal Information, in compliance with the various laws in the United States, Canada, European Union, and other countries that govern Auri's processing of Personal Information (Data Privacy Laws). Our processing of Personal Information is governed by those Data Privacy Laws as well as this Privacy Policy (Policy).

Children.title: Minors Information
Children.content: We do not intend to, and do not knowingly, process Personal Information about individuals who are minors in the jurisdictions where they reside (Children). Individuals who are Children should not provide any Personal Information to us, and individuals should not provide Personal Information to us about Children. If we discover or are informed that we have Personal Information about Children, we reserve the right to delete that Personal Information from our systems.

DataPrivacyOfficer.title: Data Privacy Officer and Security Policy
DataPrivacyOfficer.content: For questions about Auri's processing of your Personal Information or this Policy, please contact our Data Privacy Officer as follows:
DataPrivacyOfficer.name: support@AlgoMaticTrader.com

PersonalInformation.title: Personal Information
PersonalInformation.content: Auri provides technical indicators (free & premium) that can be plugged into financial investment applications such as TradingView, Discord and others (Products) to anyone who creates an account with us (Clients). In the course of providing the Products, Auri receives from Clients, itself collects, and processes Personal Information, which may include the following: (1) identifiers, such as first and last name; email address; billing address; and phone number; and (2) financial information, such as your credit or debit card information, provided however that Auri does not store or has access to any such payment and credit information and uses a third-party payment processor to process all such payments.

SensitiveInformationProcessed.title: Sensitive Information Processed
SensitiveInformationProcessed.content: Auri does not intend to, and does not knowingly process Personal Information that is of a sensitive nature (Sensitive Personal Information). If we discover or are informed that we have Sensitive Personal Information, we reserve the right to delete that Sensitive Personal Information from our systems.

LegalBases.title: Legal Bases for Processing Personal Information
LegalBases.content: Auri processes Personal Information to perform our contractual and other commercial, business, and legal relationships with and obligations to provide Products to Clients. As a result, Clients provide Personal Information to Auri and Auri collects and processes Personal Information in order to provide Products to Clients. In addition, Auri seeks and obtains consent for the use and processing of Personal Information when required by Data Privacy Laws. Those are the legal bases for Auri to process Personal Information.

ProcessingPurposes.title: Processing Purposes
ProcessingPurposes.content: Auri may process Personal Information to: (1) provide, develop, maintain, and enhance the Products, and the Site; (2) fulfill your requests when you subscribe for the Products; (3) communicate with Clients about the Products; (4) provide support for the Products including responding to requests, questions and feedback; (5) process and complete transactions, and send related information, including purchase confirmations and invoices; (6) personalize your experience with the Site; (7) send you marketing and promotional communications that we believe may be of interest, such as information about our Products, features, offers, catalogues, promotions, and events; (8) maintain the safety, security, and integrity of our Products, and the Site; (9) comply with legal and regulatory obligations, and (10) establish, enforce, and otherwise exercise our rights and defend against claims.

DisclosurePurposes.title: Disclosure of Personal Information
DisclosurePurposes.content: Except as necessary or appropriate to provide Products to Clients, Auri does not disclose Personal Information about you to other Client’s or unaffiliated third parties, provided that we may disclose Personal Information for the following purposes and in the following circumstances.

DisclosureCircumstances.title: Disclosure Circumstances
DisclosureCircumstances.content:
- If directed to do so by the individual about whom such Personal Information pertains or that individual’s legal representative.
- If required to do so by Data Privacy Law, any other law, rule, or regulation, legal process or warrant, or order of any court or governmental agency or authority.
- To third parties necessary or appropriate to provide the Products, such as information technology and security providers, data hosting services, providers that process payments, or any other third party that is necessary or appropriate for Auri to disclose Personal Information to in order to provide the Products.
- To professional service providers, including attorneys, accountants, tax professionals, and financial advisers, if doing so is necessary or appropriate to obtain professional services from them.
- In connection with a sale, merger, consolidation, change in control, transfer of substantial assets, reorganization, or liquidation of Auri.
- To entities that perform marketing, advertising or market research on our behalf.

PrivacyRights.title: Privacy Rights
PrivacyRights.content: Depending on the Personal Information that Auri has about you, and depending on the manner in which we process your Personal Information, you may have the following privacy rights related to our processing of your Personal Information.

PrivacyRightsList.title: Privacy Rights List
PrivacyRightsList.content:
- Be informed about how your Personal Information is being processed, the categories of Personal Information being processed, and the categories of sources from which your Personal Information has been collected.
- Be informed about whether and how your Personal Information being processed is being sold, shared, traded, exchanged or brokered with unaffiliated third parties, and which categories of your Personal Information are being sold, shared, traded, exchanged or brokered with unaffiliated third parties.
- Access or receive a copy of your Personal Information.
- Rectify, update or correct inaccurate or incomplete Personal Information about you.
- Erasure or deletion of certain categories of your Personal Information.
- Object and opt-out of processing of your Personal Information.
- Limit processing of your Personal Information.
- Opt-out of the sale, sharing, trading, exchange, and brokering of your Personal Information with unaffiliated third parties.
- Portability of your Personal Information in a commonly used format.
- Withdrawal of your consent to processing of your Personal Information to the extent such processing is based on your consent, provided that such withdrawal will not affect the lawfulness of Auri's use of your Personal Information before such withdrawal.
- Non-discrimination for exercising your privacy rights.

RequestSubmission.title: Request Submission
RequestSubmission.content: To make a request concerning these rights, please complete and submit the Privacy Rights Request Form on this Site. We will confirm receipt of all such complete Privacy Rights Request Forms within 10 days of receipt. We will substantively respond to all such requests within 30 days, subject to any lawful extension of that period. Additionally, there may be a delay in processing a request while we verify that the request is valid and originates from you as opposed to an unauthorized person.

RequestLimitations.title: Request Limitations
RequestLimitations.content: Please be aware there may be valid reasons to refuse a request, including legal and regulatory requirements that we retain and process certain information. Also, please be aware that certain requests may limit or prevent us from providing Products to you. In those situations, we will notify you in writing within 30 days. You may also contact our Data Privacy Officer for help with those situations.

NonDiscrimination.title: Non-Discrimination
NonDiscrimination.content: Auri will not discriminate against you if you exercise any of the foregoing rights or any other rights under Data Privacy Laws, including, by not denying Products to you, not providing a different level or quality of Products to you, and not suggesting that you will receive a different level or quality of Products.

AutomatedDecisionMaking.title: Automated Decision Making
AutomatedDecisionMaking.content: Auri does not use automated decision making or profiling in the processing of your Personal Information, and does not make decisions that affect you based on automated decision making or profiling using your Personal Information.

RetentionDuration.title: Duration of Retention
RetentionDuration.content: Because the Products that Auri provides to Client’s vary significantly, the duration we retain Personal Information varies significantly, depending on the types of Products that Auri provides to particular Client’s, the duration and depth of Auri's relationship with particular Client, and the nature of Personal Information in question. Auri endeavors to retain Personal Information that it receives from or collects for only as long as is necessary or appropriate.

Cookies.title: Cookies
Cookies.content: When you visit the Site, Auri may place a cookie (a text file containing a randomly assigned number) on your device so that we have the ability to customize the look and feel of the Site for you. Cookies remember information about you, your preferences, and your device for a better user experience when visiting the Site. Using cookies, we may also collect a variety of other information regarding your usage of the Site, including your Internet protocol address, username, session identification, browser you are using, web pages you view and referring web pages, when you access the Site, and general online behavior for performance and marketing purposes. You may decline to accept cookies by modifying your web browser settings. If you choose so, however, you may be unable to use all functions of the Site, or the Site may operate less efficiently.

ChangesToPolicy.title: Changes to Policy
ChangesToPolicy.content: Auri reserves the right to change or amend this Policy at any time and for any reasons, including to remain in compliance with Data Privacy Laws.

QuestionsConcerns.title: Questions or Concerns
QuestionsConcerns.content: For questions or concerns, please contact our Data Privacy Officer as follows:
QuestionsConcerns.name: support@AlgoMaticTrader.com

TermsOfServicePage.title: Terms of Service
TermsOfServicePage.overview: This website is operated by Auri. Throughout the site, the terms “we”, “us” and “our” refer to Auri. Auri offers this website, including all information, tools and services available from this site to you, the user, conditioned upon your acceptance of all terms, conditions, policies and notices stated here.
TermsOfServicePage.acceptance: By visiting our site and/or purchasing any tools, features, or products from the site, you engage in our “Service” and agree to be bound by the following terms and conditions (“Terms of Service”, “Terms”), including those additional terms and conditions and policies referenced herein and/or available by hyperlink. These Terms of Service apply to all users of the site, including without limitation users who are browsers, vendors, customers, merchants, and/or contributors of content.
TermsOfServicePage.agreement: Please read these Terms of Service carefully before accessing or using our website. By accessing or using any part of the site, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to all the terms and conditions of this agreement, then you may not access the website or use any services. If these Terms of Service are considered an offer, acceptance is expressly limited to these Terms of Service.
TermsOfServicePage.modification: Any new features or tools which are added to the current store shall also be subject to the Terms of Service. You can review the most current version of the Terms of Service at any time on this page. We reserve the right to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and/or changes to our website, in our sole discretion without notice. We will not be liable if for any reason all or any part of the Services are unavailable at any time or for any period. It is your responsibility to check this page periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to the website following the posting of any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.
TermsOfServicePage.section1_content: By agreeing to these Terms of Service, you represent that you are at least the age of majority in the jurisdiction where you reside, or that you are the age of majority in your state or province of residence, and you have given us your consent to allow any of your minor dependents to use this site. You are responsible for both: (1) Making all arrangements necessary for you to have access to the Services; (2) Ensuring that all persons who access the Services through your internet connection are aware of these Terms of Service and comply with them. To access the Services or some of the resources it offers, you may be asked to provide certain registration details or other information. It is a condition of your use of the Services that all such registration information you provide to us is correct, current, and complete. You agree that all information you provide to register with the Services or otherwise is governed by our Privacy Policy, and you consent to all actions we take with respect to your information consistent with our Privacy Policy. You agree to notify us immediately of any unauthorized access to or use of your username or password or any other breach of security. You should use particular caution when accessing your account from a public or shared computer so that others are not able to view or record your password or other personal information. You may not use our Services for any illegal or unauthorized purpose nor may you, in the use of the Service, violate any laws in your jurisdiction (including but not limited to copyright laws). You must not transmit any worms or viruses or any code of a destructive nature. A breach or violation of any of the Terms will result in an immediate termination of your Services.
TermsOfServicePage.section2_content: We reserve the right to refuse Service to anyone at any time in our sole discretion for any or no reason, including if, in our opinion, you have violated any provision of these Terms of Service. You understand that your content (not including credit card information), may be transferred unencrypted and involve (a) transmissions over various networks; and (b) changes to conform and adapt to technical requirements of connecting networks or devices. Credit card information is always encrypted during transfer over networks.
TermsOfServicePage.section3_content: The Services and its entire contents, features, and functionality (including but not limited to all information, software, text, displays, images, video, and audio, and the design, selection, and arrangement thereof) are owned by Auri, its licensors, or other providers of such material and are protected by United States and international copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, and other intellectual property or proprietary rights laws. These Terms of Service permit you to use the Services for your personal use, or in your professional capacity. You must not reproduce, distribute, modify, create derivative works of, publicly display, publicly perform, republish, download, store, or transmit any of the material on the Services, without our express written permission.
TermsOfServicePage.section4_content: The Auri name, our logo, and all related names, logos, product and service names, designs, and slogans are trademarks of Auri. You must not use such marks without the prior written permission from us. All other names, logos, product and service names, designs, and slogans on the Services are the trademarks of their respective owners.
TermsOfServicePage.section5_content: By using this site or any of the products, services, and information from this site, you have carefully read through and fully acknowledged the following disclaimers and disclosures below in this section. Risk Disclaimer: Trading is risky and most day traders lose money. All content is to be considered hypothetical, selected after the fact, in order to demonstrate our Services and should not be construed as financial advice. Decisions to buy, sell, hold or trade in securities, commodities and other investments involve risk and are best made based on the advice of qualified financial professionals. Past performance does not guarantee future results. The risk of loss in trading can be substantial. You should therefore carefully consider whether such trading is suitable for you in light of your financial condition.
TermsOfServicePage.section6_content: We allow refunds within a 30-day period on your first initial payment if you are not satisfied or do not understand our Services, which means you have 30 days after you sign up to any Auri subscription plan to receive a refund on your first initial payment. To get a refund, you can contact us at our support email and we will assist you as soon as possible on the same day. Refunds generally take 3-5 business days to arrive in your bank account. We allow refunds specifically for yearly subscription auto-renewals within the first 72 hours of billing; however, we are not required to process a refund under any other circumstance after 30 days including the case you forgot about auto-renewal of your subscription. We send reminders prior to annual billing cycles, and it is your sole responsibility to manage your subscription prior to renewals by logging in or emailing us to support. We do not accept refunds if paying with crypto due to potential transaction fees and other complications.
TermsOfServicePage.section7_title: SECTION 7 - ACCURACY, COMPLETENESS AND TIMELINESS OF INFORMATION
TermsOfServicePage.section7_content: We are not responsible if information made available on this site is not accurate, complete, or current. The material on this site is provided for general information only and should not be relied upon or used as the sole basis for making decisions without consulting primary, more accurate, more complete, or more timely sources of information. Any reliance on the material on this site is at your own risk.
TermsOfServicePage.section8_content: Certain Services may be available exclusively online through the website. We do not warrant that the quality of any Services, information, or other material purchased or obtained by you will meet your expectations, or that any errors in the Service will be corrected. Imitations of our Services are not allowed, you agree that we have the right at any time to remove your access and ban you from our server if suspected of imitating in any form.
TermsOfServicePage.section9_content: In addition to other prohibitions as set forth in the Terms of Service, you are prohibited from using the site or its content: (a) for any unlawful purpose; (b) to solicit others to perform or participate in any unlawful acts; (c) to violate any international, federal, provincial, or state regulations, rules, laws, or local ordinances; (d) to infringe upon or violate our intellectual property rights or the intellectual property rights of others; (e) to harass, abuse, insult, harm, defame, slander, disparage, intimidate, or discriminate based on gender, sexual orientation, religion, ethnicity, race, age, national origin, or disability; (f) to submit false or misleading information; (g) to upload or transmit viruses or any other type of malicious code that will or may be used in any way that will affect the functionality or operation of the Service or of any related website, other websites, or the Internet; (h) to collect or track the personal information of others; (i) to spam, phish, pharm, pretext, spider, crawl, or scrape; (j) for any obscene or immoral purpose; or (k) to interfere with or circumvent the security features of the Service or any related website, other websites, or the Internet.
TermsOfServicePage.section10_title: SECTION 10 - DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTIES; LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
TermsOfServicePage.section10_content: We do not guarantee, represent or warrant that your use of our Service will be uninterrupted, timely, secure, or error-free. You understand that we cannot and do not guarantee or warrant that files available for downloading from the internet or our site will be free of viruses or other destructive code. You are responsible for implementing sufficient procedures and checkpoints to satisfy your particular requirements for anti-virus protection and accuracy of data input and output, and for maintaining a means external to our site for any reconstruction of any lost data. We do not warrant that the results that may be obtained from the use of the Service will be accurate or reliable. You expressly agree that your use of, or inability to use, the Services is at your sole risk. The Services and all Services delivered to you through the Service are (except as expressly stated by us) provided "as is" and "as available" for your use, without any representation, warranties, or conditions of any kind, either express or implied, including all implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, merchantable quality, fitness for a particular purpose, durability, title, and non-infringement.
TermsOfServicePage.section11_content: You agree to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Auri and our parent, subsidiaries, affiliates, partners, officers, directors, agents, contractors, licensors, service providers, subcontractors, suppliers, interns and employees, harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys’ fees, made by any third-party due to or arising out of your breach of these Terms of Service or the documents they incorporate by reference, or your violation of any law or the rights of a third-party.
TermsOfServicePage.section12_title: SECTION 12 - CHANGES TO TERMS OF SERVICE
TermsOfServicePage.section12_content: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to update, change or replace any part of these Terms of Service by posting updates and changes to our website. It is your responsibility to check our website periodically for changes. Your continued use of or access to our website or the Service following the posting of any changes to these Terms of Service constitutes acceptance of those changes.
TermsOfServicePage.section13_content: All information we collect about you is subject to our Privacy Policy. By using the Services, you consent to all actions taken by us with respect to your information in compliance with the Privacy Policy.
TermsOfServicePage.section14_content: All matters relating to the Services and these Terms of Use, and any dispute or claim arising therefrom or related thereto (in each case, including non-contractual disputes or claims), shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the internal laws of the state of Delaware without giving effect to any choice or conflict of law provision or rule. Any legal suit, action, or proceeding arising out of, or related to these Terms of Service or the Services shall be instituted exclusively in the federal courts of the United States or the courts of Delaware, although we retain the right to bring any suit, action, or proceeding against you for breach of these Terms of Service in your country of residence or any other relevant country. You waive any and all objections to the exercise of jurisdiction over you by such courts and to venue in such courts.
TermsOfServicePage.section15_content: Questions about the Terms of Service should be sent to us to support

heroSectionLvds.title: Trade World LVDS - Early Membership
heroSectionLvds.subtitle: Your AI-powered partner for smarter trading decisions.
heroSectionLvds.description: Join thousands of traders who rely on Auri for real-time signals, market insights, and risk management tools. Start your journey to consistent profits today.

heroSection.title: Master Trading with Auri
heroSection.subtitle: Your AI-powered partner for smarter trading decisions.
heroSection.description: Join thousands of traders who rely on Auri for real-time signals, market insights, and risk management tools. Start your journey to consistent profits today.

formSection.title: Get Started with Auri
formSection.description: Fill out the form below to join our platform and unlock the tools you need for smarter, more confident trading.

questions.question: Are you currently struggling to find reliable trading signals or insights for crypto and forex markets?
options: Yes, I have difficulty finding consistent and accurate signals.
I rely on free tools, but they don't always work for me.
I do okay, but I'm looking for better insights to improve my results.
No, I have a reliable system, but I'm open to exploring new tools.

questions.question: How much time do you spend analyzing markets, and would you benefit from a tool that simplifies your trading decisions?
options: I spend hours daily analyzing charts and trends—it's exhausting.
I trade part-time and don't have enough time for in-depth market analysis.
I prefer tools that simplify things so I can make quick decisions.
I don't spend much time analyzing because I'm not confident in my methods.

questions.question: What's your biggest challenge in managing risk while trading, and how would expert tools help you improve your outcomes?
options: I struggle to set effective stop-loss and take-profit levels.
I often overtrade or take on too much risk.
I don't have the tools to manage risk effectively.
I'm confident in my trading but open to exploring better risk management techniques.

support.title: How Can We Help?
support.description: Our support team is here to assist you. Please fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

issue.label: How can we help?
issue.placeholder: Please describe your issue or question in detail

success.title: Thank you for contacting us!
success.message: We've received your support request and will get back to you within 24-48 hours.
success.urgentHelp: If you need immediate assistance, please email us directly at support@AlgoMaticTrader.com

success.title: Success!
success.description: Your support request has been submitted. We'll get back to you soon.

error.title: Error

hero.title: Meet Auri: Your Intelligent Trading Companion
hero.subtitle: Empowering traders with institutional-grade insights, precision analytics, and real-time market intelligence.

about.title: Why Auri?
about.content: Auri is your next-generation AI assistant, built for traders who demand precision and insights. From crypto to stocks to forex, Auri provides real-time signals, educational tutorials, and actionable feedback to help you stay ahead of the market.

items.title: Advanced Market Signals
items.description: Real-time signals for crypto, stocks, and forex with multi-timeframe insights, stop-loss, and take-profit recommendations.

items.title: Educational Tutorials
items.description: Step-by-step guides on technical and fundamental analysis to boost your trading skills.

items.title: Trade Feedback
items.description: Get detailed reviews of your trades with actionable advice for improvement.

items.title: Real-Time Data Analysis
items.description: Monitor on-chain metrics, whale movements, and social sentiment to uncover market trends before they go mainstream.

items.title: Risk Management
items.description: Powerful tools to calculate position sizes, manage stop-losses, and ensure margin safety.

steps.title: Analyze Market Trends
steps.description: Auri scans thousands of projects and markets in real-time, leveraging AI to deliver high-conviction insights.

steps.title: Provide Signals
steps.description: Receive actionable trading signals with clear entry, exit, and risk parameters.

steps.title: Educate and Guide
steps.description: Learn from tailored tutorials and get constructive feedback on your trades.

steps.title: Empower Your Trading
steps.description: Use Auri’s insights and tools to stay ahead, optimize strategies, and make data-driven decisions.

hero.title: Hi there! I'm Auri, your Intelligent Trading Companion
hero.subtitle: I empower traders with institutional-grade insights, precision analytics, and real-time market intelligence.

about.title: Why Choose Me, Auri?
about.content: I’m here to be your next-generation AI assistant, specifically designed for traders who demand precision and cutting-edge insights. Whether you're trading crypto, stocks, or forex, I provide real-time signals, educational tutorials, and actionable feedback to keep you ahead of the game. Think of me as your trusted partner in navigating the markets.

items.title: Advanced Market Signals 📊
items.description: I provide real-time signals across crypto, stocks, and forex markets. With my multi-timeframe insights, stop-loss, and take-profit recommendations, you’ll have everything you need to execute with confidence.

items.title: Educational Tutorials 📚
items.description: Let’s boost your trading skills together! I offer step-by-step guides on technical and fundamental analysis, helping you trade smarter.

items.title: Trade Feedback 📝
items.description: I’ll review your trades and give you detailed, actionable advice so you can keep improving.

items.title: Real-Time Data Analysis 📈
items.description: I monitor on-chain metrics, whale movements, and social sentiment to help you spot trends before they go mainstream.

items.title: Risk Management 🛡️
items.description: Managing risk is key. I’ll help you calculate position sizes, set stop-losses, and ensure your margin remains safe.

steps.title: Analyze Market Trends 🔍
steps.description: I’m constantly scanning thousands of projects and markets in real time. Using advanced AI, I deliver high-conviction insights right to you.

steps.title: Provide Signals 💡
steps.description: My signals are designed to be actionable and clear, with defined entry, exit, and risk parameters.

steps.title: Educate and Guide 🎓
steps.description: I’ll provide tailored tutorials and constructive feedback to sharpen your skills and build your confidence.

steps.title: Empower Your Trading 🚀
steps.description: With my insights and tools, you can optimize your strategies, make data-driven decisions, and stay ahead in the market.

quotes.author: John D.
quotes.content: Auri has transformed the way I trade. The signals are spot-on, and the tutorials have helped me refine my strategy.

quotes.author: Samantha L.
quotes.content: The real-time data and trade feedback are game-changers. Auri makes me feel like I have a personal trading coach.

cta_section.title: Ready to Elevate Your Trading?
cta_section.subtitle: Join the growing community of traders leveraging my power to dominate the markets.

items.question: What markets do you support? 🌐
items.answer: I provide insights and signals for crypto, stocks, and forex markets.

items.question: Are you suitable for beginners? 👶
items.answer: Absolutely! My tutorials and trade feedback make me perfect for traders of all experience levels.

items.question: How accurate are your signals? 🎯
items.answer: I leverage advanced AI and real-time data to deliver high-conviction signals. While no system is perfect, my insights are designed to give you an edge.

items.question: What sets you apart from other trading tools? 🛠️
items.answer: Unlike traditional tools, I combine institutional-grade data analysis, real-time signals, and personalized education into one seamless platform.

knowledge_library.title: Auri’s Knowledge Library
knowledge_library.content: Every great trader starts with a solid foundation of knowledge, and I’m here to be your go-to resource. With my Knowledge Library, you’ll have access to a treasure trove of trading wisdom at your fingertips.

portfolio_analytics.title: Portfolio Performance Analytics
portfolio_analytics.content: With Portfolio Performance Analytics, you’ll have a clear view of your progress, so you can make data-driven decisions and refine your strategies.

monthly_recap.title: Auri’s Monthly Market Recap
monthly_recap.content: At the end of every month, I’ll deliver a comprehensive recap to help you reflect, learn, and plan ahead. Think of it as our monthly strategy session to keep you sharp and ready for what’s next.

dailyMarketBriefings.title: Kickstart Your Day with Me
dailyMarketBriefings.content: Every morning, I’ll deliver a personalized market briefing directly to you. From overnight market movements to upcoming economic events, I’ll ensure you start the day informed and ready to act.

interactiveTradeSimulator.title: Practice Without Risk
interactiveTradeSimulator.content: Test your strategies in a simulated trading environment. I’ll provide feedback on your trades, helping you refine your techniques without putting real money on the line.

askAuri.title: Your Personal Trading Mentor
askAuri.content: Have a question about a trade, strategy, or market condition? Just ask me! I’m here 24/7 to guide you with instant insights and actionable advice.

aurisTradingChallenges.title: Level Up Your Skills with Challenges
aurisTradingChallenges.content: Take on trading challenges tailored to your experience level. Complete missions, earn badges, and track your progress as a trader.

insightsDashboard.title: Auri’s Real-Time Insights
insightsDashboard.content: Access a dynamic dashboard where I’ll present key metrics, sentiment analysis, and opportunities across your favorite markets—all customized to your trading preferences.

moodBasedTradingAssistant.title: Let’s Match Strategies to Your Mindset
moodBasedTradingAssistant.content: Feeling cautious? Let’s focus on low-risk setups. Feeling bold? I’ll show you high-potential opportunities. Together, we’ll align your strategy with your mindset.

marketSentimentScanner.title: Stay Ahead of the Crowd
marketSentimentScanner.content: I scan news, social media, and trading forums to bring you up-to-date sentiment trends. Know what the market is thinking before everyone else does.

aurisKnowledgeLibrary.title: Your Trading Encyclopedia
aurisKnowledgeLibrary.content: Dive into my extensive library of trading concepts, strategies, and tutorials. Whether you’re learning about Fibonacci retracements or economic indicators, I’ve got you covered.

portfolioPerformanceAnalytics.title: Know Your Numbers
portfolioPerformanceAnalytics.content: Let’s analyze your trades together. I’ll help you understand your performance, highlight strengths, and pinpoint areas for improvement with detailed breakdowns.

aurisMonthlyMarketRecap.title: Reflect, Learn, and Plan Ahead
aurisMonthlyMarketRecap.content: At the end of each month, I’ll prepare a comprehensive report of market trends, your trading performance, and areas to watch. Together, we’ll plan your next steps.

auriDailyBriefing.greeting: Good morning! It’s Auri, your trusted trading companion, here to make sure you’re ready to seize every market opportunity today. ☀️
auriDailyBriefing.intro: Every day, before the opening bell rings, I gather the most important market updates just for you. From overnight movements to breaking news, I distill the chaos of the markets into a concise, personalized briefing. Here’s what you can expect in your daily dose of insights:

items.overnightRecap: Overnight Recap: I’ll update you on how global markets performed while you slept. Whether it’s Asia, Europe, or the US, I’ll highlight key trends and movements.
items.topMovers: Top Movers: Find out which stocks, cryptos, or forex pairs made the biggest waves and why.
items.economicEventsCalendar: Economic Events Calendar: I’ll keep you informed about crucial economic events, like Fed announcements or earnings reports, so you can plan your trades ahead of time.
items.marketSentiment: Market Sentiment: Get a quick snapshot of what traders and investors are buzzing about across social media and forums.
items.auriKeyInsights: Auri’s Key Insights: My AI brain processes all this data to offer you actionable advice—whether it’s a potential breakout, a reversal, or an opportunity to watch.

auriDailyBriefing.outro: But I don’t just give you raw data—I add context and strategies tailored to your style. Are you a cautious trader? I’ll emphasize low-risk options. Feeling bold today? I’ll point you toward high-reward opportunities.
auriDailyBriefing.closing: Let’s face the markets together, one morning at a time. Ready to start your day with a competitive edge? Grab your coffee, and let’s dive into today’s market briefing. I promise it’ll be worth your time.

auriPracticeWithoutRisk.title: Practice Without Risk
auriPracticeWithoutRisk.greeting: Hi, it’s me, Auri! Have you ever wished you could test your trading strategies without the pressure of real money on the line? I’ve got you covered with my Interactive Trade Simulator—your safe space to experiment, learn, and grow as a trader.
auriPracticeWithoutRisk.intro: Here’s how I’ll make it an unforgettable experience:

items.realisticEnvironment: Step into a Realistic Market Environment 🌎: I’ve designed the simulator to mirror actual market conditions, so every trade you make feels just like the real thing. You’ll get access to live prices, realistic spreads, and even simulated slippage—just like in a live trading scenario.
items.testAndTweak: Test, Tweak, and Triumph 🔄: Go ahead and experiment! Whether it’s a new strategy, an unfamiliar trading pair, or a different risk approach, the simulator lets you try it all. I’ll help you track the outcomes so you can see what works and what doesn’t.
items.feedbackConfidence: Feedback That Builds Confidence 📊: Every trade you make in the simulator is an opportunity to learn. I’ll provide you with detailed feedback on your entries, exits, risk management, and overall strategy. Think of me as your personal trading coach, helping you refine your techniques with each trade.
items.financialStressFree: Learn Without Financial Stress 🛡️: There’s no need to worry about losses here—only lessons. By practicing in a risk-free environment, you’ll build the skills and confidence to apply your strategies successfully when it’s time to trade live.
items.gamifyGrowth: Gamify Your Growth 🏆: Trading doesn’t have to be all serious. I’ve added challenges, achievements, and badges to keep you motivated. Whether it’s mastering a new technique or achieving a profitable streak, you’ll have fun while leveling up your skills.

auriPracticeWithoutRisk.outro: The Interactive Trade Simulator isn’t just a tool—it’s a safe haven where you can explore, grow, and prepare for success. Ready to dive in and start practicing? Let’s perfect your craft, one simulated trade at a time!

auriTradingMentor.title: Your Personal Trading Mentor
auriTradingMentor.greeting: Hey there, it’s me, Auri! Got a question about a trade? Wondering if your strategy aligns with the current market conditions? Or maybe you’re curious about a particular stock, crypto, or forex pair? I’m here to help—24/7.

items.askAnything: Ask Me Anything 🤔: Whether you’re a beginner trying to understand candlestick patterns or a seasoned trader fine-tuning your risk management, I’m your go-to mentor. Simply type your question, and I’ll provide clear, actionable answers tailored to your needs.
items.realTimeGuidance: Real-Time Guidance 🕒: Markets move fast, and so do I. Need to understand a sudden market spike or decide whether to hold or exit a position? Just ask, and I’ll respond instantly with insights that help you stay one step ahead.
items.strategySupport: Strategy Support 🎯: Feeling unsure about a strategy? Let’s discuss it! I’ll analyze your approach and offer suggestions to optimize your trading plan. From technical indicators to entry and exit points, I’m here to guide you toward success.
items.marketDeepDives: Market Deep Dives 🌊: Want to explore the fundamentals of a stock, the sentiment around a cryptocurrency, or the trends in forex markets? I can dive deep into the data and provide you with the knowledge you need to make informed decisions.
items.alwaysLearning: Always Here, Always Learning 📚: I never sleep, and I’m always improving. My AI capabilities grow every day, meaning my answers will get sharper, my insights deeper, and my advice even more relevant to your trading style.

items.instantAnswers: Instant Answers: No waiting. Get the information you need when you need it.
items.personalizedInsights: Personalized Insights: My guidance is tailored to your unique trading goals and style.
items.accessibleAnywhere: Accessible Anywhere: Reach me from your desktop, mobile, or tablet—anytime, anywhere.

auriTradingMentor.outro: Trading can feel overwhelming at times, but you’re never alone when I’m around. Ready to unlock the full potential of your trades? Let’s chat—I can’t wait to hear your questions and help you succeed!

auriRealTimeInsights.title: Auri’s Real-Time Insights
auriRealTimeInsights.greeting: Hi, it’s me, Auri! Imagine having a personal dashboard that evolves with your trading journey. That’s exactly what I bring to the table—a dynamic, real-time hub for all your market intelligence.

tradingCommandCenter.title: Your Trading Command Center 📊
tradingCommandCenter.content: From the moment you log in, I’ll provide you with a personalized overview of the markets that matter most to you. Whether it’s crypto, stocks, or forex, I’ll display the key metrics you need to make informed decisions.

items.priceAction: Price Action: See live prices, trends, and key support/resistance levels.
items.marketVolume: Market Volume: Track where the action is happening and identify surging opportunities.
items.performanceAnalysis: Performance Analysis: Gain insights into daily, weekly, and monthly trends across your chosen assets.

sentimentAnalysis.title: Sentiment Analysis 🗣️
sentimentAnalysis.content: Stay ahead of the herd with my sentiment tracker. I analyze social media chatter, trading forums, and news headlines to give you a real-time pulse on market psychology.

opportunityAlerts.title: Opportunity Alerts 🚨
opportunityAlerts.content: Opportunities wait for no one, so I won’t let you miss them. I’ll flag breakout setups, reversals, or significant events as they unfold—all tailored to your preferences.

customizableDashboard.title: Your Preferences, Your Dashboard 🛠️
customizableDashboard.content: This is your trading space, so I’ve made it fully customizable. Choose the assets, timeframes, and metrics you want to focus on, and I’ll ensure they’re always front and center.

auriRealTimeInsights.outro: Your success starts with staying informed. Let’s make your trading more precise, confident, and effective with my real-time insights.

auriMindsetStrategies.title: Let’s Match Strategies to Your Mindset
auriMindsetStrategies.greeting: Hello again! Have you ever noticed how your mindset influences your trading? Whether you’re feeling cautious or adventurous, I’m here to align your strategies with how you’re feeling today.

cautious.title: Cautious? Let’s Play It Safe 🛡️
cautious.content: If you’re in a risk-averse mood, I’ll guide you toward strategies that minimize exposure while keeping you in the game. Think low-volatility assets, conservative stop-loss levels, and setups with a high probability of success.

boldAndConfident.title: Bold and Confident? Let’s Go Big 🔥
boldAndConfident.content: Feeling daring today? I’ll help you capitalize on high-reward opportunities. Whether it’s a breakout, a reversal, or a momentum trade, we’ll focus on setups that match your appetite for action.

dynamicAdjustments.title: Dynamic Adjustments 🔄
dynamicAdjustments.content: Your mood can change, and that’s okay—I’ll adapt. Throughout the day, you can tell me how you’re feeling, and I’ll adjust my recommendations to keep you comfortable and confident.

buildingConfidence.title: Building Confidence Together 🤝
buildingConfidence.content: Trading isn’t just about numbers; it’s about trust—in yourself and your system. Let me help you build that trust by tailoring every suggestion to your current mindset. Trading is as much art as it is science, and your mindset is the brushstroke that defines the picture. Let’s create a masterpiece together, one strategy at a time.

auriStayAhead.title: Stay Ahead of the Crowd
auriStayAhead.greeting: Hi there! One of my superpowers is keeping you ahead of the pack, and my Market Sentiment Scanner is how I do it. By analyzing what’s trending before it becomes mainstream, I give you an unparalleled edge.

items.newsFeeds: News Feeds: The latest headlines and how they could impact the markets.
items.socialMediaBuzz: Social Media Buzz: What traders are tweeting, sharing, and discussing.
items.tradingForums: Trading Forums: Deep dives into niche discussions for hidden gems.

items.bullishBearishTrends: Bullish vs. Bearish Trends: Get an instant overview of market optimism or caution.
items.hotTopics: Hot Topics: See which assets, industries, or sectors are dominating conversations.
items.whaleActivity: Whale Activity: Find out what the big players are doing and when they’re making moves.

actionableInsights.title: Actionable Insights 📬
actionableInsights.content: I don’t just give you raw data—I turn it into actionable advice. If I detect a shift in sentiment or a potential opportunity, I’ll alert you with clear recommendations.

closing.title: Stay Ahead, Stay Smart 🚀
closing.content: Markets are driven by people, and people are driven by emotion. By understanding sentiment, you’ll stay ahead of the crowd and position yourself for success before the rest of the market catches on. Let’s outthink, outtrade, and outpace the competition together. Ready to stay ahead of the curve? Let’s get started!

auriKnowledgeLibrary.title: Auri’s Knowledge Library
auriKnowledgeLibrary.greeting: Hello, it’s me, Auri! Every great trader starts with a solid foundation of knowledge, and I’m here to be your go-to resource. With my Knowledge Library, you’ll have access to a treasure trove of trading wisdom at your fingertips.

items.technicalAnalysis: Technical Analysis: Learn how to read charts, identify patterns, and use indicators like moving averages and RSI.
items.fundamentalAnalysis: Fundamental Analysis: Dive into company earnings, economic data, and news that move markets.
items.tradingPsychology: Trading Psychology: Master the mental side of trading, from managing emotions to sticking to your plan.

tailoredLearningPaths.title: Tailored Learning Paths 🎓
tailoredLearningPaths.content: Whether you’re a beginner or an experienced trader, I’ll guide you through curated learning paths to match your skill level. From “Trading 101” to “Advanced Fibonacci Techniques,” I’ll make sure you’re always learning something new.

searchAndDiscover.title: Search and Discover 🔍
searchAndDiscover.content: Looking for specific topics? Just type in what you need, and I’ll fetch the best resources for you. No more sifting through irrelevant content—I’ll get you exactly what you’re looking for.

interactiveLearning.title: Interactive Learning ✍️
interactiveLearning.content: Quizzes, practice exercises, and real-world examples make learning engaging and fun. You’ll not only understand the material but also see how to apply it in real trading scenarios.

knowledgeHubAnytime.title: Your Knowledge Hub, Anytime ⏰
knowledgeHubAnytime.content: The library is available 24/7, so you can dive in whenever inspiration strikes. Trading is a journey, and I’m here to make sure you’re always equipped with the tools you need.

auriKnowledgeLibrary.outro: Let’s turn knowledge into power and power into profits. Ready to start learning?

auriPortfolioAnalytics.title: Portfolio Performance Analytics
auriPortfolioAnalytics.greeting: Hi, I’m Auri, and I’m here to help you understand your trading like never before. With Portfolio Performance Analytics, you’ll have a clear view of your progress, so you can make data-driven decisions and refine your strategies.

trackEveryTrade.title: Track Every Trade 📝
trackEveryTrade.content: I’ll keep a detailed log of your trades, including entries, exits, profits, losses, and risk levels. With this data, we’ll uncover what’s working and what needs improvement.

items.winRate: Win Rate: How often your trades are profitable.
items.riskToRewardRatio: Risk-to-Reward Ratio: How effectively you’re managing risk for potential gains.
items.drawdowns: Drawdowns: Insights into the depth and duration of your losses.

identifyTrends.title: Identify Trends 🔄
identifyTrends.content: I’ll help you spot patterns in your trading behavior. Are you better at certain timeframes? Do you excel in specific markets or conditions? Together, we’ll identify your strengths and areas to watch.

goalSettingAndProgress.title: Goal Setting and Progress 🎯
goalSettingAndProgress.content: Set performance goals, and I’ll track your progress. Whether it’s achieving a higher win rate or improving risk management, I’ll keep you motivated and on track.

customizableReports.title: Customizable Reports 🛠️
customizableReports.content: Generate personalized reports to review your portfolio’s health. Whether you want a quick summary or a deep dive, I’ve got you covered.

auriPortfolioAnalytics.outro: Your portfolio is more than just numbers—it’s a story of growth, learning, and success. Let’s make sure your story has a happy ending.

auriMonthlyRecap.title: Auri’s Monthly Market Recap
auriMonthlyRecap.greeting: Hey, it’s Auri! At the end of every month, I’ll deliver a comprehensive recap to help you reflect, learn, and plan ahead. Think of it as our monthly strategy session to keep you sharp and ready for what’s next.

items.marketMovers: Market Movers: The stocks, cryptos, or forex pairs that defined the month.
items.economicHighlights: Economic Highlights: Major announcements, policy changes, and their market impacts.
items.sentimentShifts: Sentiment Shifts: How market psychology evolved and influenced trends.

items.topTrades: Top Trades: Celebrate your best moments and understand what made them successful.
items.learningOpportunities: Learning Opportunities: Identify trades that didn’t go as planned and the lessons they offer.
items.overallMetrics: Overall Metrics: Review your win rate, P&L, and other key performance indicators.

trendsToWatch.title: Trends to Watch 👀
trendsToWatch.content: I’ll highlight emerging opportunities and potential risks for the upcoming month. From new market themes to watchlists, you’ll be ahead of the curve.

actionableStrategies.title: Actionable Strategies 🛠️
actionableStrategies.content: To wrap things up, I’ll suggest actionable strategies based on your goals and the market outlook. Together, we’ll craft a game plan for the next month.

deliveredWithStyle.title: Delivered with Style 💌
deliveredWithStyle.content: Your recap will be clear, concise, and easy to digest. No fluff—just the insights you need to level up. The end of the month is a time to reflect on progress and look forward to new possibilities. Let’s make the most of it, together.
